channel.title: Sports on Casual Inference
channel.description: Recent content in Sports on Casual Inference

item.title: Fantasy Football season in review (2017-2018)
item.description: This season, a friend invited me to join his family’s Fantasy Football league, which gave me a chance to dabble in analytics. Prior to this season, I’ve been more interested in American Football the band than the sport. I know people who make fantasy football decisions for non-rational reasons (e.g. choosing players out of loyalty). On the other hand, I also know those who use their intimate knowledge of the sport to take into account relevant information a novice like me might overlook (e.
